Patti Ayers
===========

![PattieAyers](https://www.pittsburgtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=2540 "PattieAyers")



Patti Ayers
-----------

[Email Patti Ayers](mailto:payers@pittsburgtx.gov)

Patti has lived in Pittsburg all of her life except while attending Texas Christian University. Upon graduating from TCU, Patti returned to Pittsburg and started her own retail business in downtown Pittsburg for several years before being employed for the State of Texas for 32 years. Upon Patti’s retirement she began serving on several boards and committees in the City of Pittsburg and Camp County.

Presently, Patti is a City of Pittsburg appointed board member for the Pittsburg-Camp County Library, serves on the City of Pittsburg Planning and Zoning Commission, the Camp County Sheltered Workshop, and the DIP committee for Pittsburg ISD.  Patti has served as past president of the Twentieth Century Study Club and was Election Judge for numerous state, county, and city elections. Patti is looking forward to serving the citizens of Pittsburg while on the City Council as Place 1 Seat.

* [Bill Pay](https://www.municipalonlinepayments.com/pittsburgtx)
